### Assignment4 solution

`python3 assignment4.py`

We have to convert data from bytes. This is the reverse of what has been done in assignment3.

```
Enter the name of file containing data
>   <path to the file> 
```

##### Sample 
```
Enter the name of file containing data
>../Assignment3/4363de44cf11799a8b2ae12074fc8edf82aa0ec698c5591498a5f286f59cf0f4.dat

Transaction ID:  4363de44cf11799a8b2ae12074fc8edf82aa0ec698c5591498a5f286f59cf0f4
```
